mapper.delete: delete from user_article where user_id = #{userId} AND article_id =#{articleId}
mapper.select: select distinct a.price,a.article_id, a.title, a.images,u.nickname as pulisher,a.create_time,a.user_id from user_article au left join article a on au.user_id = a.user_id left join user u on a.user_id = u.user_id where au.user_id = #{userId} and au.favorite = 1 and a.`condition` = 1

select article_id, title, content, images, create_time, update_time, user_id, status,price,t.name as typeName from cdc.article a left join `type` t on a.type_id = t.id where article_id = #{articleId} AND `condition` = 1
mapper.insert: insert into cdc.article(title, content, images, create_time, update_time, user_id, status, condition) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{images}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{userId}, #{status}, #{condition})
